node.excerpt: I’m fortunate to enjoy my job. I hope you do too. Figuring out clever solutions to difficult problems is innately satisfying. However, I’ve always felt a yearning for various hobbies and side projects to augment the gratification I get from my work. I recently gained some clarity about this yearning: what it is we are looking for, and why it’s important. Hopefully there’s something here that strikes a chord with you, and is of use.

frontmatter.title: Life coaches hate this one crazy trick to stave off burn-out and increase motivation!

node.excerpt:
I was always told to prize gifts that people had put time and effort into.
Hoping my SO shared the same view, I decided to make her a little something for
her birthday. Being creatively barren, I attempted plagiarism.

frontmatter.title: Home-made present: how to make a punch box
